Scene:
The Shooting in the Dark
(Yamazaki kaidō futatsudama / 山崎街道二つ玉)

Play: The League of the 47 Ronin (仮名手本忠臣蔵)

Production: October 1972

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Komatsudayū II (豊竹小松大夫 (二))

Toyotake Sakitayū (豊竹咲大夫)



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Enza V (鶴澤燕三 (五))



Other Musicians (Koto/Kokyu):

Tsuruzawa Seiji (鶴澤清治)

Takezawa Danjirō IV (see also Takezawa Danshichi) (竹澤団二郎 (四))



Performers:

Puppeteer Character Kashira

(斧定九郎) 		Bunshichi
(文七)
